flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Stops the foe from moving with rocks and cuts SPEED.
flavor_text.emerald: Stops the foe from moving with rocks and cuts SPEED.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: Boulders are hurled at the foe. It also lowers the foe’s SPEED if it hits.
